name: Beyond Tomorrow
description: TAJA’s program activities include; - Service Connection Workshops - Sexual Orientation and Gender Identity Training - Service Linkage TAJA’s Coalition hosts community convenings for transgender women of color to express their experiences accessing community services. Beyond Tomorrow is a workshop series that assists the TGNB community (Transgender Non-Binary) in navigating today’s world with information that will help change the trajectory of this community.
